org.apache.abdera2.protocol.client
Class CachingClient

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.abdera2.protocol.client.Client
      org.apache.abdera2.protocol.client.CachingClient

public class CachingClient
extends Client

Alternative implementation of the Abdera Client that uses client-side Caching. This is intended to be used as a drop-in replacement to the base Client when caching capabilities are desired.
